content.raw: I like how you used the rosparameters, but I believe that putting this in a namespace or changing the variable name might be more clear. `requested` as a parameter is a bit more vague in my opinion than `world_gen/requested` or `world_gen/yaml` or `world_yaml`. Is there another reason why \`requested\` would be better?
content.html: I like how you used the rosparameters, but I believe that putting this in a namespace or changing the variable name might be more clear. requested as a parameter is a bit more vague in my opinion than world_gen/requested or world_gen/yaml or world_yaml. Is there another reason why `requested` would be better?
